Actions: Engage with land managers to share and implement best practices on stream crossings and fish passage
Details: This should include encouraging better consultation before crossings are installed in the first place.

Actions: Support and engage with First Nations guardians programs where appropriate
Details: This could include approaching KNC about their existing guardian program.

Actions: Engage with ATV clubs/recreation groups to share and implement best practices on stream crossings and fish passage
Details: Trail-stream crossings have a low extent and severity in the watershed, and it is unlikely that ATV groups are creating barriers to fish passage.
